Question: In 1995, this person signed a deal with ReganBooks worth $3 million to write his second book, Miss America.
Hints: In December 2010, this person re-signed his contract with Sirius to continue his show for a further five years.
This person was born on January 12, 1954, into a Jewish family who lived in Jackson Heights, Queens in New York City.
The station paired this person with Robin Quivers, a newscaster and consumer affairs reporter from WFBR in Baltimore.
